name: Reaper of Repose
prereq: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; Master Proficiency In A Weapon
summary: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses.
description:
Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses. When you make an attack using a weapon with which you have master proficiency and hit an undead creature, you ignore 5 points of the creature’s resistances, and the undead’s weaknesses are 2 higher against your attack.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
